exceptions.exn: In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r Hl'' : 2 * l < r w, u, u1, u2 : nat H18 : 1 + (r - 1) * w = power (S (power (S l) 2)) r H19 : u * u = u1 + u2 H20 : u1 = u * u ⇣ w H21 : u2 = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) H22 : power 2 r + u1 = u + power (power (S l) 2) r H23 : divides (power 4 r) u1 Hw_0 : w = ∑ (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => power i r) Hw_1 : w = ∑ (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r) Hw : w = msum nat_join 0 (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r) Unable to unify "w = ∑ (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r)" with "2 * msum nat_join 0 (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r) = msum nat_join 0 (S (power (S l) 2)) (fun i : nat => 2 * power i r)".
